content: Reminder - we have a lunch meeting 12:30 today Drumond East, 3rd floor
Reminder that we have a joint FMG/FGB on Sunday lunch and a solo FMG session Monday Q0 - i.e. 7am Monday.
Second reminder of the FMG/FGB joint at lunch today (Pecan) and the FMG session at 7am tomorrow (Monday) also in Pecan
are there FMG meetings this week? I see mention on FHIR-I agenda, but I don't see a schedule on FMG confluence.
There is one listed in Whova, starting in 30 mins
Itâ€™s listed under FHIR Management Group directly, not FHIR-I
I was looking for agenda on confluence

https://confluence.hl7.org/x/_4nGBg

Can SMART Health Cards: Vaccination and Testing IG PSS have 10-15 minutes on the agenda for Q4 Thursday?
We can try to squeeze that in. Is there a short fuse?

Sponsoring WG voted to approve change back to Universal Realm. FMG and others had approved PSS as US Realm. TSC gave us until the end of May for them to approve the PSS. Not clear if FMG and others (co-sponsor WGs OO and PE, CSD) need to vote again as UV. At a minimum wanted to inform FMG/others about status.

I don't think FMG needs to review that unless you've already balloted or published the IG. (And in that case, it's more for a 'heads up' because work will be required in infrastructure rather than because we have any authority to approve or reject the change. If TSC is comfortable you meet the requirements for universal, FMG won't second guess that.

First IG ballot is targeted at Sept 2021. FMG approved PSS (as US Realm) on 7 April. Co-sponsors (OO, PE) just approved the change to UV during Q2. I think you are saying that FMG does not need to re-vote. I would be happy to provide a brief update to FMG on Thurs Q4 if you think that is called for.
If we have time, we'd be happy to hear an update, but you're correct - no need for FMG approval for this change.
